commit message:
Fixes multiple crashes (#14, credits go to @BoBeR182 for finding them).
Polish translation was also updated.

Beginning work on issue #7.
The user can now click on an icon to perform a Google search of the updated APK.

Started implementing the settings activity (#16) and finished implementing the web search for updated APKs (fixes #7).
Background checks can now be disabled.

Bugfix: Updated minSdkVersion in the manifest, which somehow had reverted to 19 (#8).

Update french translations of strings.xml

As per values/strings.xml

Merge pull request #17 from Primokorn/patch-3

Update french translations of strings.xml

Merge pull request #18 from Chamelleon/patch-1

Update strings.xml (Polish translation)

Merge pull request #19 from Chamelleon/patch-2

Update strings.xml (Polish translation)

Bugfix: The user agent in `VersionGetTask` could be null on some devices. There is now a UA to fall back to.
Bugfix: Quashed some more unchecked `app.getVersion` which could return null. I really hope it was the last of them.
Version bump and update of the readme.
Fixed a line that couldn't be translated.
Adding missing resources to the repository (#22). Apologies!
